description: A very simple, but tasty appetiser that combines the fresh sweetness of the melon, with the saltiness of bacon and a kick of spice from the spiced peanuts.
name: Melon with Chilli Peanuts & Streaky Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large melon, sliced into 4 and seeds removed

recipeInstructions.text: Pan fry the bacon on a non-stick pan for 3 minutes or until cooked fully. Remove from the heat and allow to cool to one side.
Slice the melon into bite size portions. Serve the melon with the chilli peanuts and streaky bacon.
